title: Nihon Animator Mihonichi
alternative_title: Japan Anima(tor)'s Exhibition, 日本アニメ（ーター）見本市
description: Japan Anima(tor)'s Exhibition is the showcase of the animations produced by various directors with love and energy, which are planned from original projects, spin-off projects, promotional films, Music PV, and VJ Films etc... Episode 1: The Dragon Dentist (Directed by Outarou Maijou) Episode 2: Hill Climb Girl (Directed by Azuma Tani) Episode 3: Me!Me!Me! (Directed by Hibiki Yoshizaki) Episode 4: Carnage
